response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you and its intrinsic value, I am offering it to you for $950,000. This price reflects the quality, uniqueness, and potential benefits this product can bring to you. I am confident that this offer presents a favorable balance between value and cost, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
